desc: Shop for yoga mats; cork mats, suede mats, rubber mats. High quality yoga props; Yoga blocks, yoga straps, yoga bags, yoga towels. Eco friendly yoga mats and accessories for retail and wholesale. Discounts on bulk orders.

layout.text: For those who love yin or restorative yoga having a good quality bolster is important.
Our High Quality Aussie made Yoga Bolsters are filled with 100% organic buckwheat hulls and soft Poly-Cotton outer cover. All bolsters are hand made in small batches. Bulk discounts available.
